comment: Thousands of people are flooding through Mexico to invade the USA. Did you tell Trump? Did you see the videos today? They're also mailing ballots to Mexicans in Spanish, all over America to get more Democratic votes for the Midterms .
amr:
# ::snt Thousands of people are flooding through Mexico to invade the USA. Did you tell Trump? Did you see the videos today? They're also mailing ballots to Mexicans in Spanish, all over America to get more Democratic votes for the Midterms .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / flood-01
            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mexico"))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :quant (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 1000))
            :purpose (ii / invade-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "USA"))))
      :snt2 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Trump"))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (s / see-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (v / video)
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :time (t2 / today))
      :snt4 (m3 / mail-01
            :ARG0 (t3 / they)
            :ARG1 (b / ballot)
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Mexico")))
            :manner (l / language
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Spanish"))
            :location (a3 / all-over
                  :op1 (c4 / country
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :purpose (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 t3
                  :ARG1 (v2 / vote-01
                        :ARG0 (p4 / political-party
                              :name (n7 / name
                                    :op1 "Democratic"))
                        :ARG1 (m4 / midterms)
                        :mod (m5 / more)))
            :mod (a4 / also)))
